data.title: Paul Randolph Gher
data.meta_description: Born in Aug 28, 1919 and died in Jul 31, 2009. Buried in St Francisville, Lawrence County IL, Oak Lawn Cemetery - St Francisville. Paul Randolph Gher.
data.text:
Paul Randolph Gher Born: Aug 28, 1919 Died: Jul 31, 2009 Plot:

US Army WWII veteran

Age: 89

Born & died: St Francisville

Son of: Oliver Esco Gher* & Jessie Magnus Mayer*

Married: 4 Jun 1938 Irma Jean Keen*

Lived at: 1930-50 St Francisville

Children:

- Virginia A (ca 1942 IL m: ? VanWey-Gooddard KS)

- John K (16 Mar 1940 m: Susan-St Francisville)

- Billy Ray* (1943 St Francisville)

- Robert (m: Tamara-Lawrenceville IL)

- Ronnie (ca 1953 m: Toni-Orange TX). (obit of Paul and Billy)
